channel.title: Trichoderma Asperellum on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in Trichoderma Asperellum on funPlantGenes

item.title: TasHyd1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: TasHyd1 Gene Name: hydrophobin 1 Genome: Species: Trichoderma asperellum Functional Descriptions: TasHyd1, a new hydrophobin gene from the biocontrol agent Trichoderma asperellum, is involved in plant root colonization.
